The following Pseudo-Code is suggested for improving generalization in spar=
se high dimensional design spaces:

1) For each dimension individually:
   =
a) Select discretization level
   b) Cluster
   c) Sort clusters by cluster=
 centroid
   d) Reassign cluster ID by sorted order
   e) Renormalize on ne=
w cluster ID
2) Repeat for each dimension
